topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549b317c6368727e38bd0f00#post_549b317c6368727e38bd0f00
Alright, no problem.

Well, it depends on the kind of Titan one would use.
An Atlas can be, like kinda medium difficulty to take down, since it's balanced.
An Orge can be pretty tough to take down, so don't take it head on.
And a Stryder can be easy to take down, though it can dodge your attacks and is fast.
Even if you knew these info, I don't know that, so don't blame me for not having mindreading powers.
